description: DecisionGraph Dual-Gate Test Corpus - 25 Bank-Grade Test Cases

test_families.ESCALATE: Cases that MUST escalate (true positive detection)

mitigating_factors.recurring_pattern_explained: Medical treatment payments - consistent with prior years

top_match.ownership_link: Alexei Volkov - 50% UBO - EU Sanctions List

mitigating_factors.document_fraud_detected: Invoice verification failed - supplier does not exist

mitigating_factors.customer_refusal: Refused to explain source of funds after 3 requests

mitigating_factors.conflicting_explanations: First stated: 'business income'. Second stated: 'inheritance'. Third stated: 'lottery winnings'.
